Name: Heartless
About the game: The protagonist happened to be involved in an incident. Will she be able to escape from the upcoming threats and survive? [Heartless] is a single play action TPS game that follows the story. Become the [Heartless] hero and enter the world now. [Heartless] offers the following play: Four or more types of guns action plays Undercover assassination action play A new story, and a new world Caution: Heartless is the first project game of Cresent, a Korean college indie game development team. It's a game that lacks a lot and leaves a lot of room for improvement, but please play with a broad mind. Thank you.
